title: Gift of Diamonds
description: Seventeen-year-old Mica is a determined aspiring actress living with her parents in Romania as Nicolae Ceausescu begins his reign. Her parents are covertly political and influential, which makes them a perfect target for the Secret Police. They’re soon arrested, and Mica flees the country with her father’s rare—and possibly cursed—diamonds. With her parents imprisoned, it’s up to Mica to investigate the terrorism involving Ceausescu and his nuclear business partners.The series has won these 1. 2021 AMERICAN FICTION AWARD FINALIST, G ift of Diamonds : Mystery/ Suspense2. 2021 AMERICAN FICTION AWARD FINALIST, Love Romance3. NYC BIG BOOK AWARD 2021 Winner, Love Odyssey , Romance/ Thriller4. INDEPENDENT PRESS AWARD, 2022 DISTINGUISHED Love Odyssey, Romantic Suspense5. INDEPENDENT PRESS AWARD, 2022 DISTINGUISHED Treasure Seekers, International Thriller6. GLOBAL THRILLER FINALIST 2022, CIBA, CHANTICLEER INTERNATIONAL BOOK AWARD, Treasure Seekers, International ThrillerBest Sellers Rank: #21,437 Free in Kindle Store (See Top 100 in Kindle Store)#16 in Historical European Fiction#32 in Women's Historical Fiction#38 in Historical Mystery, Thriller & Suspense Fiction
author: Roberta Seret
